articles.title: Boris Becker will be moved to softer jail within weeks and may serve only TEN months - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former tennis star, 54, arrived on Friday at HMP Wandsworth, a category B prison just over two miles from Wimbledon's Centre Court where he won three Grand Slam titles.
articles.content:
